text:
On the office sofa...
When lounging around...

If someone from another unit comes...
I... I wonder what to do...

Hehe, I can relate
It's a bit worrying, isn't it?

I'm sure they feel
the same way.

How about we just lay
around together?

Isn't this our chance to
get to know each other?

Certainly...!
If we talk, we might understand each other...!

Eh, really...?
...I'll try my best next time then...

Is that so...?
Then, next time... should I invite someone...?

Talking is easy to say...
But actually doing it is... ultra hard...!
